mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Barclay, Ted, 1844-1915
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Complains has received no mail. Describes construction of winter quarters. Complains about "incessant rain." Asks about Christmas at home. Describes picket duty on Rapidan River. Complains about drunk officers.
There are three files available: a PDF transcription, a plain text transcription, and a PDF which was created from scans of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Confederate States of America. Army. Liberty Hall Volunteers
